author: My smart guide
title: iPhone 8 release date, features: Late launch expected over delay in mass production
text:
Apple the best company to build smart phones.
Apple has the tradition of releasing its iPhone devices in September, and the current iPhone 7 also arrived in the same month last year, but the launch of the upcoming flagship dubbed as the iPhone 8 is likely to be delayed.
Apple is going to make there phone smart like iPhone 7 and iPhone 7plus.Top contributor of Apple tell some spec of iPhone 8 and there is one one phone of Apple is coming soon ‘iphone prime’ this phone will be 5G and finally  apple gives you ultra HD.
HAVE YOU FOLLOWED US.
